H0.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1521

H1.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1534

H2.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1540

H3.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1491-1556

A4.text: Ignatius of Loyola was born c. 23 October 1491 – 31 July 1556

A5.text: On the morning of the 15th of August, 1534, in the chapel of the Martyrium of Saint Denis, in Montmartre, Loyola and his six companions... took upon themselves the solemn vows of their lifelong work.

A6.text: Ignatius of Loyola founded the religious order of the Society of Jesus (Jesuits), and became its first Superior General, in Paris in 1541
